scripts.test: scripts/be-status && scripts/fe-status && scripts/clean-dist && tsc --showConfig && tsc && nightwatch --config nightwatch.conf.e2e.js --env chrome --filter '*.test.js' ./dist/test/e2e
scripts.test:dev: scripts/clean-dist && tsc --showConfig && tsc && nightwatch --config nightwatch.conf.e2e.js --env chrome --filter '*.test.js' --skipgroup regression ./dist/test/e2e
